pages.title: Invisible Armor
pages.text: An armor made from glass that serves absolutely zero protection value. You don't know why you made this... unless you have a way to override what your armor looks like?

pages.title: Invisible Helmet
pages.text: Helmet and Boots require two Topaz and Citrine, Chestplate and Leggings three.$(br2)$(o)Pointless without some sort of Cosmetic Armor mod$()
